display_name: Patient Health Questionnaire 9: Moving or speaking slowly
description:
Item from Patient Health Questionnaire 8-item. [Kroenke K et al. 2001 (PubMED ID: 11556941)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1495268/)

[Search for all PHQ-8 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/bestair/variables?search=phq8)

Original question: Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? 8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving arounda lot more than usual
